title: Episode 78 - Kudlow and Candy
description: The fellas hammer the woke language police, Hunter Biden's corrupt dealings, and give the people the candy they crave: King of the Hill and Dem or Journo. Interview with Former Director of the National Economic Council, Larry Kudlow.
author: hello@ruthlesspodcast.com (Larry Kudlow, Josh Holmes, Comfortably Smug, Michael Duncan)
content:encoded: The fellas hammer the woke language police, Hunter Biden's corrupt dealings, and give the people the candy they crave: King of the Hill and Dem or Journo. Interview with Former Director of the National Economic Council, Larry Kudlow.
